metadata.description: Expert knowledge base for interpreting citizen feedback, service quality dimensions, and generating improvement recommendations. Designed to be combined with survey scores and sentiment analysis results.

responsiveness.issue: Slow response to citizen requests and inquiries
responsiveness.root_cause: Lack of response time standards, monitoring, and workload prioritization
responsiveness.impact: Delays frustrate citizens and reduce trust in government efficiency
solutions: Set clear response time standards for all services
Use a ticket-based system to track citizen requests
Assign staff responsible for monitoring pending requests
Train frontline staff to prioritize urgent concerns

reliability.root_cause: Absence of standardized procedures and performance monitoring
reliability.impact: Citizens lose confidence when services are delayed, incomplete, or incorrect
solutions: Standardize service procedures across all transactions
Create service checklists to avoid missed steps
Monitor service completion rates regularly
Hold staff accountable for service delays or errors

facilities.root_cause: Limited maintenance, outdated equipment, and poor facility planning
facilities.impact: Uncomfortable environments negatively affect citizen satisfaction and accessibility
solutions: Improve cleanliness and seating in waiting areas
Ensure facilities are accessible to PWDs and senior citizens
Upgrade service counters and equipment
Improve signage to guide citizens easily

communication.issue: Unclear or insufficient communication with citizens
communication.root_cause: Lack of clear information channels and staff communication skills
communication.impact: Citizens become confused, make errors, and feel poorly assisted
solutions: Provide clear service instructions at service counters
Train staff to communicate politely and clearly
Use posters and digital screens for service information
Ensure citizens understand service steps before processing

costs.issue: Perceived high or unclear service costs
costs.root_cause: Poor transparency in fees and inconsistent explanation of charges
costs.impact: Citizens may suspect unfair practices or corruption
solutions: Display official service fees clearly in visible areas
Ensure staff explain costs before processing transactions
Prevent unauthorized or unofficial charges
Regularly review fees to ensure fairness

integrity.issue: Lack of trust in service fairness and honesty
integrity.root_cause: Weak enforcement of ethical standards and complaint mechanisms
integrity.impact: Erodes public trust and damages institutional credibility
solutions: Strictly enforce anti-fixing and anti-corruption policies
Provide clear complaint and whistleblowing channels
Train staff on ethical behavior and accountability
Display service commitments and integrity pledges

assurance.issue: Citizens lack confidence in staff competence
assurance.root_cause: Insufficient training and uneven staff skill levels
assurance.impact: Citizens doubt the accuracy and professionalism of services
solutions: Conduct regular skills and knowledge training for staff
Ensure staff are familiar with service procedures
Assign experienced staff to complex transactions
Encourage courteous and professional behavior

outcome.issue: Service outcomes do not meet citizen expectations
outcome.root_cause: Weak evaluation of completed services and limited feedback utilization
outcome.impact: Citizens perceive services as ineffective or low quality
solutions: Review completed transactions for quality and accuracy
Use citizen feedback to improve service outcomes
Set performance targets for service completion
Continuously improve service processes based on results

overall_service_experience.issue: High overall public dissatisfaction with government services
overall_service_experience.root_cause: Multiple service weaknesses across different service quality dimensions
overall_service_experience.impact: Low public confidence and negative perception of government performance
solutions: Analyze negative feedback to identify common problem patterns
Create a comprehensive service improvement action plan
Conduct customer service and values training for all staff
Monitor service performance regularly and apply corrective actions

citizen_charter_awareness.issue: Low public awareness of the Citizen’s Charter
citizen_charter_awareness.root_cause: Insufficient and ineffective information dissemination strategies
citizen_charter_awareness.impact: Citizens are unaware of their rights, service standards, and timelines
solutions: Post the Citizen’s Charter in visible public areas
Distribute brochures explaining available services
Publish the Citizen’s Charter on the website and social media
Educate citizens on their rights and service standards

sentiment_integration_rules.purpose: Guidelines for combining sentiment analysis with service quality issues

rules.critical: If negative sentiment percentage is 60% or higher
rules.high: If negative sentiment percentage is between 40% and 59%
rules.moderate: If negative sentiment percentage is between 20% and 39%
rules.low: If negative sentiment percentage is below 20%

sentiment_integration_rules.usage: Sentiment severity should be used to prioritize issues and escalate recommendations, not to replace service quality scores.
